feed.title: GitHub Perl Daily Trending
feed.subtitle: Daily Trending of Perl in GitHub

entry.title: Vivtek/CSS-Declarative
entry.summary:
A declarative framework for CSS

CSS::Declarative is a domain module for the Decl language/framework that makes it easy to incorporate CSS declarations into a site without having to specify them as dumb text.

Honestly, there's just not much to look at here.
